channel.title: All Good Java Coders Please Come Here I Need Help! Giving adminship on server
channel.description:
hi im working on my server and im getting an error that isnt letting anyone onto my server including me when ever i try logging in it says that im already logged in! im so annoyed i worked soo hard on the server and its not letting me into it. here is what i get when i compile.
[code]Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from ZAIN:1301 Client type: low memory version UserId: 9744031 kriptick is signing onto server. kriptick: character file not found. LOADED: 3 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:31) ClientHandler: Accepted from ZAIN:1302 Client type: low memory version UserId: 50367134 kriptick is signing onto server. [client-2-kriptick]: kriptick is already online. [/code]
thats what i get when i compile and here is what i think is the error. [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:31) [/code] could someone plz tell me how to fix this or get past it cause im really annoyed im hopeing one of the better coders could help me out here thnx. whoever helps me ill make them admin of my server if i think they are trustworthy thnx guys. :)

@ii_own_ii wrote:

did u compile or just run server

item.title: All Good Java Coders Please Come Here I Need Help! Giving adminship on server
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

[quote=“Ice, post:4, topic:30856”]Hi,
I think this might be the problem. But it might not be.

You’ve got 3 Exceptions in ItemHandler.Java, The 3 Exceptions are at Lines 312, 39 and 31.
You also have Low memory.

If you go to ItemHandler.Java and Hold Ctrl and G, Then search for the Lines.[/quote]

Search for those lines, fix them, recompile.

Or if you have a backup of it you can replace it and take the easy way out.

Read full topic
item.source: All Good Java Coders Please Come Here I Need Help! Giving adminship on server

hi im working on my server and im getting an error that isnt letting anyone onto my server including me when ever i try logging in it says that im already logged in! im so annoyed i worked soo hard on the server and its not letting me into it. here is what i get when i compile.

Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from ZAIN:1301 Client type: low memory version UserId: 9744031 kriptick is signing onto server. kriptick: character file not found.
